data_table.description: EDIC. Peripheral vascular disease of participants with Type 1 diabetes and involved in the "Diabetes Control and Complications Trial (DCCT) and Epidemiology of Diabetes Interventions and Complications Study (EDIC)" project.

variable.name: FORM
variable.description: EDIC form number

variable.name: CLINIC
variable.description: A1. Identifying information. De-identified EDIC clinic number

variable.name: IBB1B
variable.description: B1. Recognition of event: if date uncertain

variable.name: IBB3
variable.description: B3. Recognition of event. How did clinic learn of the event
variable.value: Annual medical history and physical exam
Clinic recognized event and informed patient

variable.name: IBC1
variable.description: C1. Intermittent claudication (peripheral ischemia). Do you get pain in either leg on walking?

variable.name: IBC2
variable.description: C2. Intermittent claudication (peripheral ischemia). Does pain begin when standing or sitting

variable.name: IBC3R
variable.description: C3r. Intermittent claudication (peripheral ischemia). In what part of your (right) leg do you feel pain?

variable.name: IBC3L
variable.description: C3l. Intermittent claudication (peripheral ischemia). In what part of your (left) leg do you feel pain?

variable.name: IBC4
variable.description: C4. Intermittent claudication (peripheral ischemia). Do you get it (pain) if you walk uphill or hurry?

variable.name: IBC5
variable.description: C5. Intermittent claudication (peripheral ischemia). Do you get pain if you walk at an ordinary pace on the level?

variable.name: IBC6
variable.description: C6. Intermittent claudication (peripheral ischemia). Does the pain disappear while you are walking?

variable.name: IBC7
variable.description: C7. Intermittent claudication (peripheral ischemia). What do you do if you get pain when you are walking?

variable.name: IBC8
variable.description: C8. Intermittent claudication (peripheral ischemia). What happens to pain if stand still

variable.name: IBC9
variable.description: C9. Intermittent claudication (peripheral ischemia). If pain is relieved by standing still, how soon?

variable.name: IBC10
variable.description: C10. Intermittent claudication (peripheral ischemia). Since first noticing the pain

variable.name: IBD1
variable.description: D1. Amputation: part of the lower extremity

variable.name: IBD2A
variable.description: D2a. Amputation: traumatic

variable.name: IBD2B
variable.description: D2b. Amputation: surgical

variable.name: IBE1
variable.description: E1. Other arterial events. Has patient had other arterial events

variable.name: IBE2A
variable.description: E2a. Other arterial events: bypass

variable.name: IBE2B
variable.description: E2b. Other arterial events: angioplasty

variable.name: IBE2C
variable.description: E2c. Other arterial events. Other arterial events

variable.name: IBE2COTH
variable.description: E2. Other arterial events. Other arterial events: specify

variable.name: IBF1
variable.description: F1. Lower extremity ulcer. Has the patient had extremity ulcer?

variable.name: IBF2AF
variable.description: F2af. Lower extremity ulcer: right side, foot

variable.name: IBF2AL
variable.description: F2al. Lower extremity ulcer: right side, leg

variable.name: IBF2BF
variable.description: F2bf. Lower extremity ulcer: left side, foot

variable.name: IBF2BL
variable.description: F2bl. Lower extremity ulcer: left side, leg

variable.name: IBF2CF
variable.description: F2cf. Lower extremity ulcer: traumatic, foot

variable.name: IBF2CL
variable.description: F2cl. Lower extremity ulcer: traumatic, leg

variable.name: IBF2DF
variable.description: F2df. Lower extremity ulcer: non-traumatic, foot

variable.name: IBF2DL
variable.description: F2dl. Lower extremity ulcer: non-traumatic, leg

variable.name: IBF2EF
variable.description: F2ef. Lower extremity ulcer: excavation of subcutaneous foot tissue

variable.name: IBF2EL
variable.description: F2el. Lower extremity ulcer: excavation of subcutaneous leg tissue

variable.name: IBF2FF
variable.description: F2ff. Lower extremity ulcer: loss of subcutaneous tissue, foot

variable.name: IBF2FL
variable.description: F2fl. Lower extremity ulcer: loss of subcutaneous tissue, leg

variable.name: IBF2GF
variable.description: F2gf. Lower extremity ulcer: inflammation, foot

variable.name: IBF2GL
variable.description: F2gl. Lower extremity ulcer: inflammation, leg

variable.name: IBF2HF
variable.description: F2hf. Lower extremity ulcer: infection, foot

variable.name: IBF2HL
variable.description: F2hl. Lower extremity ulcer: infection, leg

variable.name: IBF2IF
variable.description: F2if. Lower extremity ulcer: treatment in an office, foot

variable.name: IBF2IL
variable.description: F2il. Lower extremity ulcer: treatment in an office, leg

variable.name: IBF2JF
variable.description: F2jf. Lower extremity ulcer: treatment in a hospital, foot

variable.name: IBF2JL
variable.description: F2jl. Lower extremity ulcer: treatment in a hospital, leg

variable.name: FSASDATE
variable.description: A4. Identifying information. De-identified date form completed

variable.name: MASK_PAT
variable.description: A2. Identifying information. De-identified patient ID

variable.name: IBB1ADAT
variable.description: B1. Recognition of event. De-identified date of occurrence

variable.name: IBB2BDAT
variable.description: B2. Recognition of event. De-identified date clinic learned of the event
